document.full_text: atlanta braves pitching coach roger mcdowell has been suspended for two weeks without pay because of "inappropriate conduct" toward fans, major league baseball (mlb) said on sunday.
document.title: braves coach banned two weeks for inappropriate conduct
lines_and_colors: atlanta braves pitching coach roger mcdowell has been suspended for two weeks without pay because of "inappropriate conduct" toward fans, major league baseball (mlb) said on sunday.
